files.patch:
@@ -953,0 +953,4 @@
+    //
+    // This method does not perform bounds checking which it expects
+    // will have been done by the caller
+    //
@@ -979,0 +983,6 @@
+#if[char]
+            // StringCharBuffer overrides getArray(), so verify that a
+            // non-addressable CharBuffer here is not a StringCharBuffer
+            if (!isAddressable())
+                assert !StringCharBuffer.class.isInstance(this);
+#end[char]
@@ -1119,0 +1129,4 @@
+    //
+    // This method does not perform bounds checking which it expects
+    // will have been done by the caller
+    //
@@ -1349,0 +1363,4 @@
+    //
+    // This method does not perform bounds checking which it expects
+    // will have been done by the caller
+    //
